subject: Re: Tesing-testing
author: Fiona Broome
full_text:
Hi,

I hear "date is" then "Hebron," very clearly.  Then there's something I still can't get -- two words -- and the word "run" (or something like it) seems to be in there.  After that, it's too choppy for me to understand.  

However, my experiences so far have been a few Shack Hack sessions, only one of which impressed me, as well as listening to Chris Moon's conversations with a Frank's box in Canada during May.  The box spoke so clearly in Canada, I'm still astonished.

So, I don't have enough experience with EVP/ITC to identify anything except the most clear voices and speech.

What I listened for in this recording was what I heard in Canada, and what I've heard on several recordings posted to this list: A consistent voice in terms of tone, accent, and speech patterns.

In this recording, "Date is," "Hebron," and something before (and including) the word "run" all sound consistent to me. I'm hearing that exact same voice tone (male) towards the end of the recording, but I just can't make out the words.  I hear a K sound, but that's all I can say for sure.

Meanwhile, at the PEAR/Global Consciousness project, I'm seeing more downward spikes than normal, as of Monday.  (Tuesday's data isn't online yet, but yesterday's movie was pretty good. Watch the egg blips around South America and Japan.)

I'm not sure if this is enough to signify an event about to happen.  Usually, the numbers make the most sense in hindsight.  That's part of the learning curve as people try to understand what's causing the RNG spikes.

For those who just can't get enough predictive intrigue, there's also a linguistic-based anomaly study, the Web Bot project, http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_Bot (further explained at http://www.halfpasthuman.com/altaprocess.html )

According to Wikipedia, July 8th is predicted as significant.  I don't have the current Shape report (http://www.halfpasthuman.com/), so I don't know what (if anything) they've predicted for June.

I hardly ever watch the news, but I may start watching for a few days, out of curiosity.

It's funny, but watching for events around the 17th has some of the anticipation of the first day of school, with a hefty dose of similar anxieties as well.

Cheerfully,
Fiona


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> I don't know! To me it sounds like a military operation, but who knows.
> We'll do a little test, see if anyone else the world hears what I do.
> 
>  Frank-S
>
